name: MIS i2T Negative Behaviour Warnings Report
description:
The report shows counts of each type of negative behaviour warnings received within a user defined date range, for active prisoners at a selected establishment.
PDD0222- v1.0 Last Modified 23/07/2021

dataset.name: IEP Warnings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION AS PRISONER_LOCATION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE WHERE (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE IN ('BEHAVEWARN', 'NEG_GEN', 'IEP_WARN', 'WORKWARN') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS IN ('Active Out', 'Active In', 'Active In Transit', 'Active UAL')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, IEP_BAND, CODE, ETHNIC_CODE, PRISONER_LOCATION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'BEHAVEWARN') AS V_COUNTBEHAVEWARN, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'NEG_GEN') AS V_COUNTNEGGEN, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'IEP_WARN') AS V_COUNTIEPWWARN, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'WORKWARN') AS V_COUNTWORKWARN, SUM(V_COUNTBEHAVEWARN || V_COUNTIEPWWARN || V_COUNTNEGGEN || V_COUNTWORKWARN) AS V_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNTBEHAVEWARN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="BEHAVEWARN")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNTNEGGEN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where ([Case Note Sub Type Code]="NEG_GEN")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNTIEPWWARN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where ([Case Note Sub Type Code]="IEP_WARN")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNTWORKWARN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="WORKWARN")

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
